name: Vyrus
description:
You are a virus and you must outsmart the computer to survive!

A very normal top down shooter, very normal nothing different about it. Just standard normal :) 

ok jk jk so the concept of the game was that you would lose control over shooting as the computer would steal your ability but you still have control to when you are shooting! Have fun! 

Let us know what score you got in Endlessssss!

Controls:
Use WASD to move.

Left Mouse Click to Shoot.

Thanks for playing!

Made with love by Andrew Zi Zhen Cretu and Giacomo Autili <3

Special Thanks to Ana Letzner

This game was made for Jonas Tyroller's Wowie Jam 2 Game Jam.
